abstract: Fees for sports programming keep going up, in part because fans are so loyal. And a recent ruling against Comcast could pave the way for more sports channels. Where will it all end?
snippet: Fees for sports programming keep going up, in part because fans are so loyal. And a recent ruling against Comcast could pave the way for more sports channels. Where will it all end?
lead_paragraph: The battle between sports programming and cable providers continues to heat up. Are consumers on the losing team?

headline.main: Sports, It Seems, Explains Recent Skirmishes in Cable Industry
